directions: Pour vanilla-flavored vodka, pineapple juice, sweet and sour mix, triple sec, lime juice, and heavy whipping cream into a cocktail shaker; add ice. Cover shaker and shake vigorously. Strain cocktail into a chilled martini glass.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce sweet and sour mix
1/4 fluid ounce heavy whipping cream, or to taste
title: Key Lime Pie Martini
